Hero.title: ECMC - Empowering Saudi Businesses with Strategic and Sustainable Consulting Solutions

Overview.title: Who are we ?
Overview.textFirst: ECMC is a leading consulting company in Saudi Arabia, dedicated to empowering businesses for sustainable growth and success in local and global markets. With expertise in strategy, digital transformation, risk management, and more, we deliver tailored solutions across diverse sectors. Our team of experienced professionals focuses on innovation, excellence, and achieving client-specific objectives.
Overview.textSecond: We are committed to enhancing competitive advantage through high-quality, customized services. At ECMC, trust and long-term partnerships form the foundation of our client relationships.

overview.title: Services
overview.subTitle: Expert Consulting for Your Business Growth
overview.text1: At ECMC, we provide innovative consulting solutions designed to help businesses navigate complex challenges and seize new opportunities. Our expertise spans strategy, operations, technology, and organizational transformation, empowering companies to enhance performance and achieve sustainable growth. Whether you're a startup or an established enterprise, our tailored approach ensures practical, actionable solutions that drive real results. Discover how ECMC can partner with you to unlock your business's full potential.

strategies.title: Strategies
strategies.subTitle: Crafting Tailored, Professional Marketing Strategies to Drive Sustainable Growth
strategies.text1: At Emergence Capabilities Management Consulting (ECMC), we specialize in developing highly customized, professional marketing strategies that enable Saudi businesses to achieve sustained growth, enhance brand value, and engage effectively with their target audiences. Our deep understanding of the Saudi market and its unique dynamics allows us to design marketing solutions that are specifically aligned with your business goals and customer needs.
strategies.text2: Our services cover every aspect of marketing strategy, from market analysis and customer segmentation to brand positioning, integrated communication strategies, and performance measurement. We work closely with your team to create actionable, results-driven strategies that resonate with local and international audiences while ensuring maximum return on investment.
strategies.text3: Whether you're looking to launch a new product, refine your brand’s presence, or enter new market segments, ECMC’s tailored marketing strategies provide the expertise and precision needed to meet your objectives. With extensive experience across 21+ sectors, we empower Saudi businesses to establish a competitive edge in a rapidly evolving marketplace, contributing to the Kingdom’s economic goals under Vision 2030.
items: Market Research and Local Economy Studies

organizationalExcellency.title: Organizational excellency
organizationalExcellency.subTitle: Empowering Saudi Organizations with Tailored Excellence Solutions for Sustainable Growth
organizationalExcellency.text1: At Emergence Capabilities Management Consulting (ECMC), we specialize in driving organizational excellence for Saudi businesses by providing customized solutions designed to enhance performance, streamline operations, and foster sustainable success. With a deep understanding of the Saudi market and global best practices, we help organizations build resilient structures that adapt to evolving business environments.
organizationalExcellency.text2: Our services include governance frameworks, business process optimization, operational efficiency, risk management, and continuous improvement initiatives. By focusing on strengthening internal capabilities, we empower organizations to achieve their strategic goals, improve their competitive positioning, and ensure long-term resilience.
organizationalExcellency.text3: Whether you are seeking to enhance operational efficiency, strengthen governance, or implement innovative performance strategies, ECMC is your trusted partner. With proven expertise across 21+ sectors and a commitment to excellence, we help Saudi organizations thrive in a fast-changing market, contributing to the Kingdom’s broader economic development goals under Vision 2030.
items: Governance, risk, compliance and business continuity

marketing.subTitle: Driving Marketing Excellence for Saudi Businesses with Innovative, Tailored Strategies.
marketing.text1: At Emergence Capabilities Management Consulting (ECMC), we empower Saudi businesses to stand out in today’s competitive market through innovative, data-driven marketing solutions. Our deep understanding of the local market, combined with global expertise, allows us to deliver customized strategies that resonate with target audiences and drive sustainable growth.
marketing.text2: From crafting impactful brand identities and developing comprehensive marketing strategies to optimizing communication channels and conducting in-depth market research, our marketing services are designed to enhance your brand’s presence, improve customer engagement, and maximize ROI.

With a strong track record of success across 21+ sectors, we help businesses in Saudi Arabia create meaningful connections with their customers and achieve long-term success in an ever-evolving marketplace.

naser.name: Naser
naser.text: Nasser is a General Manager in Consulting Services, and has deep general experience with major international companies in the Middle East in many transformation, governance and organizational excellence projects, as well as his experience in developing various governance manuals, in addition to preparing and implementing many workshops and seminars in various local and regional conferences in various areas of expertise.

yazan.name: Yazan
yazan.text: Yazan has more than ten years of experience in the private sector and major consulting companies, where Yazan provided advisory services to the public, private and government sectors through the establishment and operation of governance, risk, compliance and internal audit units in accordance with the standards issued by the International Organization for Standards and Standards issued by the Institute of Internal Auditors. about.title: About us
about.subTitle: We’re Not Just Different—We’re the Golden Standard, Leading with Bold Vision and Unmatched Excellence.
about.text1: At Emergence Capabilities Management Consulting (ECMC), we are a leading consulting firm in Saudi Arabia, dedicated to empowering businesses to achieve sustainable growth and excel in both local and global markets. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, ECMC offers a wide range of consulting services tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients across various sectors, including strategy and planning, digital transformation, risk management, project management, marketing and branding, human resources, and innovation.
about.text2: Our core mission is to be the trusted strategic partner for our clients, providing customized solutions that help them reach their strategic objectives, enhance their competitive advantage, and ensure long-term success. We leverage the expertise of our highly skilled team of professionals to deliver top-quality services while building lasting relationships based on trust, collaboration, and mutual respect.
about.text3: We understand the challenges businesses face in today’s fast-evolving landscape. Our goal is to help our clients navigate these challenges by strengthening their organizational capabilities and preparing them for sustainable growth. Whether it’s improving operational efficiency, developing innovative strategies, or enhancing governance frameworks, ECMC is here to help Saudi organizations thrive.

vision.title: vision

mission.title: mission
mission.text: We are committed to delivering exceptional and comprehensive consulting services across multiple domains to help our clients enhance their institutional capabilities, adapt to evolving challenges, and contribute to the creation of a vibrant society and thriving economy in Saudi Arabia.

marketingSpecialist.title: Marketing Specialist
marketingSpecialist.summary: We are seeking a versatile and results-driven Marketing Specialist to support our offline, online, and event marketing efforts. This role is responsible for executing integrated marketing campaigns, supporting brand initiatives, and driving engagement across various platforms. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of digital and traditional marketing strategies, excellent project management skills, and experience in coordinating events to elevate our brand and achieve business objectives.
responsibilities: Develop and execute online marketing campaigns across social media, email, and paid advertising channels to drive brand awareness and engagement.
Analyze digital campaign performance using metrics and insights, making data-driven recommendations to optimize future efforts.
Support the planning and execution of offline marketing activities, such as print advertising, direct mail campaigns, and brochures.
Coordinate with designers and vendors to produce high-quality marketing collateral that aligns with brand standards.
Organize, coordinate, and execute corporate events, trade shows, and conferences to maximize brand exposure and build client relationships.
Handle event logistics, including venue selection, vendor coordination, and on-site support.
Work with the marketing team to develop event materials such as banners, booths, presentations, and promotional items.
Track event success through post-event analysis and identify opportunities for improvement in future events.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in marketing, with exposure to digital marketing, offline channels, and event coordination.
Demonstrated experience managing marketing campaigns across both digital and traditional channels.
Proficiency in marketing software and tools, such as Google Analytics, social media platforms, and email marketing platforms.
Familiarity with CRM systems, SEO, and SEM practices is a plus.
Proven track record of organizing and executing successful events.
skills: Strong project management skills with the ability to coordinate multiple marketing initiatives simultaneously.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills for clear, persuasive messaging.
Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including social media management, email marketing, and analytics tools.
Ability to work collaboratively across departments and with external partners, including designers, vendors, and event coordinators.
Analytical skills to interpret data and generate actionable insights for campaign improvement.
Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.

associateConsultant.title: Associate Consultant
associateConsultant.summary: ECMC is one of the largest local management consultancies in Saudi Arabia, and the market leader in providing multidisciplinary services for both the private and public sectors. The company offers consulting solutions in the areas of Strategy, Marketing, Operations & Organizational Excellence, and Digital, to a range of clients in both the public and private sectors. The company is heavily involved in the transformation era of Saudi Arabia, driven by the Vision 2030 initiative, in engagement with various government organizations and the Vision Realization Programs as well as the private sector. ECMC has delivered projects in more than 17 sectors for the most well-known entities in the public sector including ministries, regulatory authorities, and the Saudi Stock Exchange, as well major private sector entities in the Kingdom. Today, ECMC has offices in Riyadh and Jeddah in Saudi Arabia, as well as an office in Cairo and in London. The company is currently expanding its operations in Cairo and is hiring to support this growth. ECMC is looking for an Associate Consultant to join the team in Egypt. Ideally, you will have consulting experience gained through previous work experience.
responsibilities: Undertake primary research into customers and competitors
Work with our consulting team to determine their needs and goals by conducting interviews and surveys
Develop proposals and presentations based on research findings
Perform research tasks such as analyzing data sets or collecting information from industry experts
Present findings to clients using charts, graphs, and other visual aids such as PowerPoint presentations
Create operational plans based on available resources and aligning with organizational goals
Prepare reports summarizing research results and presenting them to management
qualifications: 2-4 years of experience in related fields
Ability to present information in easy-to-understand formats
Ability to identify and gather information from different sources
Intermediate or advanced Excel skills & PowerPoint
